name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner, v. Ursula Lisbeth HOOK, Respondent
docket_number: Petition No. 912 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1998

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner, v. Ursula Lisbeth HOOK, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of November, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed and the case is remanded for proceedings consistent with Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation v. McCafferty, 563 Pa. 146, 758 A.2d 1155 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
762 A.2d 1081
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner, v. Ursula Lisbeth HOOK, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 1, 2000.
